title: Oh Doo-Dah Day
description:
The Maine Wire's Steve Robinson is in-studio & teases a possible partnership with Gerry Callahan (00:10:00). Fallout from Ben Volin continues as Meghan Ottolini isn't sure of Volin's actual job description. Mut says there's no way Volin can appear again on WEEI (00:17:30). Courtney Cox asks Devin McCourty if he remembers the cheering at his charity event (00:40:40). A signed Paul McCartney guitar goes for $2,500 and Dave hates the person who bought it. Former President Donald Trump calls in & a sing-a-long with Rico Bosco.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
